DOC.detailed_description: Records woman trophectoderm biopsy sex selection last 3 year review . Women divide 3 group : group 1 comprise fertile woman embryo biopsy sex selection/family balance , group 2 comprise infertile woman trophectoderm biopsy group 3 comprise infertile woman IVF/ICSI without embryo biopsy . The pregnancy miscarriage rate group compare . Before start embryo biopsy process couple see geneticist assess feasibility procedure couple . Couples counsel gynaecologist specialise IVF assess fertility status explain whole procedure include expected success rate risk IVF . Women standard pituitary down-regulation GnRHa ( Triptorelin 0.1mg , Decapeptyl® Ferring , Germany ) day 7 ovulation previous cycle day 21 oral contraceptive cycle . GnRHa continue 2 week . Human menopausal gonadotrophin ( HMG ) ( Merional ®IBSA ) 150-300 IU/day administer day HCG administration , Transvaginal oocyte retrieval perform 34-36 h administration HCG . Day 5 embryo incubate calcium/Magnesium free culture . A laser beam use produce hole zona pellucida . Trophectoderm cell collect gentle suction use biopsy pipette . Florescent situ hybridization trophectoderm nucleus probe specific X- Y-chromosomes perform . embryos frozen cycle deferred.The embryos thaw follow cycle possible 2 embryo desire sex transfer .
DOC.criteria: Women undergo IVF/ICSI Women expect poor ovarian response accord Bologna criterion .
